Description

ðŸ’§ EARN DONATIONS FOR WATER CHARITIES WHEN SHOPPING ONLINE ðŸ’§

GreenH2O Rewards gets 30,000+ stores to donate to water-related charities, at no extra cost, when you shop online! You can instantly help guarantee the sustainability of our water natural resources by supporting one of our great causes.

ðŸ’§ SAVE MONEY WITH AUTOMATIC DISCOUNTS AT CHECKOUT ðŸ’§

GreenH2O Rewards also saves you time and money by testing all available discount codes, when you reach the checkout page, and automatically applying the one that saves you the most money. This way you can save money â€“ and support your favorite water charity for free!

ðŸ’§ HOW IT WORKS ðŸ’§

Just shop online as you normally would.  When you reach the website of one of our Affiliate Marketing partners, youâ€™ll be asked to activate GreenH2O Rewards with one click. This triggers our Affiliate Marketing partner to pay us a commission when you make a purchase (or complete some other action). We use that commission to make a donation to your selected charity in your name â€“ at no cost to you!

ðŸ’§ YOUR PRIVACY IS IMPORTANT ðŸ’§

The GreenH2O Rewards extension does not collect any of your personal information or payment details. It does not view your emails or record your searches. Also, we never sell your data to advertisers or other third parties.

ðŸ’§ YOUR IMPACT ðŸ’§

By using this extension, you will help save our water natural resources. The money we earn from this system goes directly towards the water-related charity of your choice (https://rewards.greenh2o.org/projects). We retain part of the revenue to build and maintain our free tools.

To keep track of your impact, create a free GreenH2O Rewards account and sign into your account through the extension. This way your activity will be recorded to your account, and you will receive email notifications of you impact.

ðŸ’§ WHO WE ARE ðŸ’§

GreenH2O Recycling has a mission to guarantee the sustainability of our natural resources through a portfolio of potable water recapture and recycling projects. This free browser extension helps us raise money to support water-related charities.

ðŸ’§ REQUIRED PERMISSIONS ðŸ’§

"Read and change all your data on the websites you visit" so that our extension can automatically recognize when you visit a partner website and apply discount codes for you.

By clicking "Add to Chrome" I accept and agree to installing the GreenH2O Rewards extension and the Privacy Policy (https://rewards.greenh2o.org/privacy) and Terms of Service (https://rewards.greenh2o.org/terms)
